goal.ch: “希望藉由本課程的學習可以增進化學系學生的數學基礎, 了解未來學習物理化學的關鍵概念“
goal.en: The aim of this course is to offer the mathematics background and the key concepts of physical chemistry.

outline.ch:
“(1) following the textbook: The Chemistry Maths Book, Erich Steiner, 2nd Edition
(2) physical chemistry
(3) Mathematics tool: Mathematica software“
outline.en:
“(1) following the textbook: The Chemistry Maths Book, Erich Steiner, 2nd Edition
(2) physical chemistry
(3) Mathematics tool: Mathematica software“

textbook.ch: “The Chemistry Maths Book, Erich Steiner, 2nd Edition“
textbook.en: “The Chemistry Maths Book, Erich Steiner, 2nd Edition“

ch.competencies: 具備數位學習與應用的能力
具備發掘問題與思考的能力
養成協調與領導的能力

en.competencies: To equip oneself with professional knowledge
To posses e-learning and computer skills
To be able to identify and solve problems
To continue to improve one‘s language skills
To develop the qualities of coordination and leadership

ch: 系所:限化學學系。年級:限二年級。
系所:限化學學系。年級:限三年級、四年級、延修生。
系所:限雙主修-化學學系。
en: Department:Department of Chemistry only.Year:Second Year only.
Department:Department of Chemistry only.Year:Third Year、Fourth Year、Deferred Student only.
